original_text: And the covering of rams' skins dyed red, and the covering of badgers' skins, and the vail of the covering,
korean_text: 붉은 물을 들인 숫양의 가죽 덮개와 해달의 가죽 덮개와 가리는 휘장과

sentences.original_text: And the covering of rams' skins dyed red,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 붉게 물들인 수양 가죽 덮개와,

sentences.original_text: and the covering of badgers' skins,
and the vail of the covering,
